ValidationRule.description: Users must send to Closed Pending Approval before the opportunity can be closed won
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = "PGi Opportunity", $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", $User.ProfileId <> "00ea0000001sYR8", $User.ProfileId <> "00e13000001x8MF", CONTAINS(TEXT(StageName), "Closed Won"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Closed Pending Approval")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Closed Won")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select "Closed Pending Approval" as Stage.
